CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 17 reads: "2, Mrs. Pauline Bolden, 7428 Hermitage St., winner of the complete bathroom, accepts her prize from M.W. Clary, left, and Theodore Dauk, right, of the Davis Brothers, Inc."
TitMainTitle: M.W. Clary standing in Davis Brothers, Inc. booth with sink, bathtub, and small toilet, in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
